1: 1 Long, clever, clean, light, brave, silly, poor, fat, deep, wide, merry, hot

1 Long (longer, the longest), clever (cleverer, the cleverest), clean (cleaner, thecleanest), light (lighter, the lightest), brave (braver, the bravest), silly (sillier, thesilliest), poor (poorer, the poorest), fat (fatter, the fattest), wide (wider, the widest),merry (merrier, the merriest), hot (hotter, the hottest).
